backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping highâ€‘level features to frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short descriptions of each frontend source file for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode tokens, and global layout defaults.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with SEO metadata, Open Graph tags, favicon links, and root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with layout and routes for all pages, rendering shared header and footer.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Reusable section wrapper providing consistent spacing and container classes.
frontend/src/components/Seo.tsx: React component that updates document title and meta/OG tags on mount.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with brand info, navigation links, contact details, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Sticky responsive header with logo, navigation, CTAs, and mobile menu using Sheet.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks; currently exports nothing.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, fonts, Tailwind layers, and light/dark theme CSS variables for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the restaurant's About page with story content, values, and styled sections.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact details, map info, and action buttons for reaching the restaurant.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows categorized image galleries with tabs and modal dialogs for enlarged viewing.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with hero banner, CTAs, highlights, and cuisine list using various UI components and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPage.tsx: Menu page displaying categorized cuisines with items, a hero section, PDF download button, and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/OffersPage.tsx: Offers page showing promotional deals with icons, descriptions, terms, and SEO metadata.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Project state metadata documenting design goals, requirements, images, and implemented features for the restaurant website.
